titleStmt.title: Whereas we have by the blessing of God discovered and disappointed a traiterous conspiracy for surprizing and taking His Majesties castle of Dublin, (His Majesties principal fort in this his kingdom), which the said conspirators had designed to do on the 21th day of this present moneth of May ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin the 23th. of May. 1663."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
